JI: Gringo Ninja Korean BBQ Workshop

Thursday January 22nd

Join us for a hands-on experience filled with tantalizing tastes, vibrant spices, and the joy of creating authentic Korean dishes.

Embark on a culinary adventure with our Korean cooking class! Explore the art of crafting mouthwatering marinades tailored to your taste, master the art of creating refreshing bean sprout and cucumber salad, and elevate your ramen game with expertly seasoned broths. From the sizzle of bulgogi to the comfort of homemade ramen, unlock the flavors of Korea while honing your kitchen prowess. Join us for a hands-on experience that promises to delight your palate and expand your culinary horizons!
CLICK TO SIGN UP

05:30 PM - 10:00 PM

JI: Galentine's Candle Workshop

Friday February 13th

Join us for a night of love and all things cute and coquette and make your very own Valentines Day Bowl! Participants will learn how to make a very cute and coquette bowl candle! All participants will leave at the end of class with a FULLY DRIED CANDLE, ready to take home! No need to pick up at a later date! Some scent options include Peony, Chocolate, Strawberry, Endless Weekend, and other sweet and clean scents! And participants will also be able to decorate their candles with mold shapes of varying coquette and valentines day molds to complete the look!! Our instructors will walk you through the process of picking your own vessels and scent! You’ll then be able to pour your wax and pick your decoration pieces while we wait for your candles to dry enough to decorate. After the decoration process is complete, we will seal your designs with a final layer of wax and you’re ready to take your candle home!
CLICK TO SIGN UP
